snippet.title: Lightyear Frontier - Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: Lightyear Frontier is a relaxing farming simulator from Frame Break games, and the developers walked viewers through some gameplay during the Future Games Show at Gamescom 2022. Lightyear Frontier is coming to PC and Xbox in Spring 2023.
